resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108578</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108578</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206064</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Multiwavelength Astronomy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Multiwavelength Astronomie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Astronomie de Multiwavelength</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Astronomia De Multiwavelength</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Astronomia Di Multiwavelength</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αστρονομία Multiwavelength</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Astronomía De Multiwavelength</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">presents images of our own galaxy and sun, other galaxies and stars, and other heavenly bodies as viewed from different portions (or frequencies) of the electromagnetic spectrum.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt Bilder unserer eigenen Galaxie und Sonne, 
anderer Galaxien und Sterne dar, und anderer himmlischer Körper, wie 
von den unterschiedlichen Teilen (oder von den Frequenzen) des 
elektromagnetischen Spektrums angesehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">présente des images de notre propres galaxie et 
soleil, d'autres galaxies et tient le premier rôle, et d'autres corps 
merveilleux comme visualisés de différentes parties (ou de 
fréquences) du spectre électromagnétique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">apresenta imagens de nosso próprio galáxia e 
sol, outras galáxias e estrelas, e outros corpos heavenly como vistos
das parcelas diferentes (ou das freqüências) do spectrum 
eletromagnético.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">presenta le immagini della nostro proprio galassia
e sole, altre galassie e stelle ed altri corpi heavenly guardando 
dalle parti differenti (o dalle frequenze) dello spettro 
elettromagnetico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρουσιάζει τις εικόνες του γαλαξία και του ήλιού 
μας, άλλων γαλαξιών και αστεριών, και άλλων θεϊκών οργανισμών 
όπως εμφανίζεται από τις διαφορετικές μερίδες (ή τις 
συχνότητες) του ηλεκτρομαγνητικού φάσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">presenta imágenes de nuestra propia galaxia y 
sol, otras galaxias y estrellas, y otros cuerpos divinos según lo 
visto de diversas porciones (o de frecuencias) del espectro 
electromágnetico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206064</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108578</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/multiwavelength-astronomy</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
